file.name: invalid-header-names.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: anApi
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /myPath:
    description: something
    parameters:
      - in: header
        name: X-@-ID
        schema:
          type: string
      - in: header
        name: valid-header
        schema:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: /myPath: parameters: parse parameter "X-@-ID": invalid header name "X-@-ID"
